String ssReportID = 'successSnapshotID';
Map<String,String> reportSectionAndDashboardMap = new Map<String,String>{
		'Section Header Slide Title'=>'{"displayType":"Section Header"}',
		'Title Slide Title'=>'{"displayType":"Title Slide"}',
		'Title and Content Slide Title'=>'{"displayType":"Title and Content"}',
		'Two Content Slide Title' => '{"displayType":"Two Content"}',
		'Comparision Slide Title' => '{"displayType":"Comparison"}'
		};

Map<ID, JBCXM__Dashboard__c> dbsMap = new Map<ID, JBCXM__Dashboard__c>([Select id from JBCXM__Dashboard__c where Name IN: reportSectionAndDashboardMap.values()]);
Delete [Select id from JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c where JBCXM__Dashboard__c IN: dbsMap.keyset()];
delete dbsMap.values();
